skillTree.name: Agility of the Lizard
skillTree.description: Lizardmen can move with deceptive speed and agility when they have to.

skillTree.name: Protection of the Old Ones
skillTree.description: Across the gulf of space, the serene Potec has shared the secrets of time so that the Lizardmen may protect themselves against supernatural attack.

skillTree.name: Honoured Elder
skillTree.description: Those Saurus not lost to war may live to a great age - their long service esteemed and respected by younger Lizardmen hungry for experience.

skillTree.name: Unyielding
skillTree.description: A survivor… or is it a really good Ward Save?

effects.description: Spread Control action: Control is modified by an additional 2

skillTree.name: Revered Guardians
skillTree.description: It has been known for Temple Guard to maintain such a sleepless vigil for centuries, thick layers of dust settling upon their reptilian forms — yet the ever-watchful guardians are not immobile statues, and can erupt into sudden violence should they perceive any threat to their charges.

effects.description:
Attribute: Causes Fear for Temple Guard and Blessed Temple Guard units
	(Hero's army)

Attribute: Unbreakable for Temple Guard and Blessed Temple Guard units
	(Hero's army)

Recruit rank: +2 for Temple Guards units
	(Hero's army)

skillTree.name: Ultimate Bodyguard
skillTree.description: Very few Saurus Temple Guard will ever prove worthy enough to protect a Slann Mage-Priest at his most vulnerable moments — when he meditates in his Eternity Chamber. Chakax is one of those who are worthy enough.

effects.description: Bonus vs. Large: +15 when fighting against Greenskin Tribes, Skaven, Dark Elves, Beastmen Warherds, Chaos and Norsca
Melee defence: +8 when fighting against Greenskin Tribes, Skaven, Dark Elves, Beastmen Warherds, Chaos and Norsca
Physical resistance: 10% when fighting against Greenskin Tribes, Skaven, Dark Elves, Beastmen Warherds, Chaos and Norsca

skillTree.name: Sacred Duty
skillTree.description: Only the most powerful of the Slann are allowed to contemplate from Xlanhuapec’s secluded Eternity Chamber and when they retire to its tranquil composure, it is Chakax alone who is entrusted to watch over them. He has been known to maintain his vigil for many centuries at a time.

effects.description:
Vigour loss reduction: -50% for Chakax and Temple Guards
	(Hero's army)

skillTree.name: Stalwart Guardian
skillTree.description: As the last line of defence between an assasin's blade and the Mage-Priest he is charged with defending, Chakax's skills as a bodyguard are commensurate with his age.

skillTree.name: The Eternity Warden
skillTree.description: Not a single Slann under Chakax' special protection has died to an enemy blow, and he has become expert at discerning the most covert of threats and then flattening them with a mighty two-handed swing.

target_if: Unit is not composed of a single entity

skillTree.name: Predatory Fighter
skillTree.description: Of course, those who live to kill must also kill to live...

skillTree.name: Enforcer of Order
skillTree.description: The Plan *will* be observed, even if every member of the younger races has to die to achieve the Old Ones' goals.

effects.description: Weapon strength: +10% when fighting against Skaven
Weapon strength: +10% when fighting against Greenskins, Skaven, Dark Elves, Beastmen, Warriors of Chaos, Daemons of Chaos and Norsca

skillTree.name: Thick-Skinned
skillTree.description: Creatures with tough hides or some kind of natural armour are tough nuts to crack - even a powerful attack may fall foul of their thick-skin.

skillTree.name: Wild-Eyed
skillTree.description: "Don't look into their eyes, there is only death there!"

skillTree.name: Conviction
skillTree.description: Such is this one's conviction that others have no choice but to believe.

skillTree.name: Foe-Seeker
skillTree.description: From one bloodied, lifeless corpse to the next, this one is always looking for the next adversary to best.

skillTree.name: Fervour
skillTree.description: This one fights with a fervour to be both admired and despised.

skillTree.name: Scarred Veteran
skillTree.description: The scars on this storied warrior reveal a veteran of many battles, a being not easy to kill and one worthy of respect and fear.

skillTree.name: Hard to Hit
skillTree.description: Hand-to-hand combat is a lethal match of cut and thrust. However, it’s not all about offensive strikes; parries and other defensive moves can also win the day.

skillTree.name: Fleet-Footed
skillTree.description: Those who are fleet of foot can reach the enemy faster.

skillTree.name: Deadly Onslaught
skillTree.description: The war is endless. The cycle of charging, clashing, and bloody hand-to-hand fighting is without end. It will never stop.

skillTree.name: Training
skillTree.description: This champion extols discipline and fear away from the battlefield as much as on it.

effects.description: Training action: Experience per turn is increased by an additional 20
Training action: Experience per turn is increased by an additional 35
Training action: Experience per turn is increased by an additional 50

skillTree.name: Spread Control
skillTree.description: The sight of this warrior, their stature, import or infamy, can have a calming effect.

effects.description: Spread Control action: Control is modified by an additional 1
Spread Control action: Control is modified by an additional 2
Spread Control action: Control is modified by an additional 3

skillTree.name: Assault Garrison
skillTree.description: "If they know I'm coming then more's the better!"

effects.description: Assault Garrison action: Additional 5% casualties inflicted
Assault Garrison action: Additional 15% casualties inflicted
Assault Garrison action: Additional 30% casualties inflicted

skillTree.name: Wound
skillTree.description: Such a champion will not bend or break, but slay in their Lord's name.

effects.description: Wound action: Additional 5% chance of wounding target
Wound action: Additional 12% chance of wounding target
Wound action: Additional 21% chance of wounding target

skillTree.name: Assault Units
skillTree.description: Lying in wait, experienced and patient, striking when the foe least expects.

effects.description: Assault Units action: Additional 3% casualties inflicted
Assault Units action: Additional 8% casualties inflicted
Assault Units action: Additional 15% casualties inflicted

skillTree.name: Specialist
skillTree.description: An expert in their craft, this Hero knows all the mistakes that can be made and how to best avoid making them.

backgroundSkills.name: The Eternity Warden
backgroundSkills.description: Chakax is the eldest of the ancient city’s Temple Guard. He has never yielded in his task and has butchered whole regiments of foes that have dared attempt to kill his charges.

target_if: Unit is a Lord or Hero

effects.description:
Enemy Hero action success chance: -50%
	(enemy characters in region)
Chance of intercepting an army using the Underway, beast-paths or Worldroots: +50%
Passive ability: "The Helm of the Prime Guardian"

unit_ability.description: The Helm of the Prime Guardian

items.name: The Helm of the Prime Guardian
items.description: Chakax wears a massive skull-helm that belonged to the first of all the Temple Guard, the Guardian of Origins. The spirit of the long-dead Saurus lingers on and heightens the bearer’s awareness of threats.

effects.description: Passive ability: "The Key to the Eternity Chamber"

unit_ability.description: The Key to the Eternity Chamber

items.name: The Key to the Eternity Chamber
items.description: The Key to the Eternity Chamber is inlaid with intricate wards that slow the passage of time, allowing the bearer to fight at the same speed as his opponent and to dodge blows with ease.

items.name: The Star-stone Mace
items.description: This massive, double-handed mace was crafted before the founding of the first temple-city, and its stone was not quarried upon this world. The star-stone itself has the rare property of rendering magical enchantments inert.
